info.description:
python-hideez
=============

Python library and commandline client for communicating with Hideez
Hardware Wallet

See <https://hideez.com> for more information

Install
-------

python-hideez requires Python 3.3 or higher. The easiest
way to install it is with `pip`.

```sh
pip3 install hideez
```

Command line client (hideezctl)
------------------------------

The included `hideezctl` python script can perform various tasks such as
signing transactions, retrieving account info and addresses.

info.html_description:
python-hideez

Python library and commandline client for communicating with Hideez Hardware Wallet

See https://hideez.com for more information

Install

python-hideez requires Python 3.3 or higher. The easiest way to install it is with pip.

pip3 install hideez

Command line client (hideezctl)

The included hideezctl python script can perform various tasks such as signing transactions, retrieving account info and addresses.
